channel.title: UTAU Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: Untramen Vocal Synth Wave 2 Charms Up for Preorder!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Digital artist Untramen Taro has unveiled her latest product. Her massive Vocal Synth Charm Set is up for pre-order! Preorders for my Vocal Synth (Wave 2) Charms are up! Preorders will end January 18th.https://t.co/5015vqK4TTCan't get them now? Don't worry! There will be a Wave 3 in the future.Want the designs in sticker form? Check out …

The post Untramen Vocal Synth Wave 2 Charms Up for Preorder! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Digital artist Untramen Taro has unveiled her latest product. Her massive Vocal Synth Charm Set is up for pre-order!

As of now, there are over 100 characters to choose from!

Every version of each vocal synth was created. Retired and canceled characters were also included.

She even added characters beyond VOCALOID! Synthesizer V, CeVIO, UTAU, Sharpkey and Alter/Ego vocal characters are available, too.

The charms are available in different sets. The cheapest option sits at a single charm for $8 USD.

Options range from a 3-charm set at $22 USD, up to a $700 USD set for all the charms!

Pre-orders are up until January 18, 2020. You can pre-order on the official product page, here!

Now, which characters are you most excited to see? Furthermore, which charm set do you want to buy? Tell us in the comments!

Sources

Untramen Taro is on Twitter, RedBubble, Etsy and her official website.
Pre-order page for Vocal Synth Charms (Wave 2) is here!

The post Untramen Vocal Synth Wave 2 Charms Up for Preorder! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
airbabe is a Japanese producer of original UTAU songs who will be releasing their first official album… on vinyl record! That’s right. On the Qrates crowdfunding site, you can now support airbabe by reserving your copy of their 8-track album entitled “Monogokoro (ものごころ)” on vinyl for ￥2,500 JPY (about $23.50 USD). Your copy will then …

The post Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
airbabe is a Japanese producer of original UTAU songs who will be releasing their first official album… on vinyl record!

That’s right. On the Qrates crowdfunding site, you can now support airbabe by reserving your copy of their 8-track album entitled “Monogokoro (ものごころ)” on vinyl for ￥2,500 JPY (about $23.50 USD). Your copy will then be shipped to you once the crowdfunding comes to an end, which will happen once it reaches 100 orders!

Check out the teaser trailer below!

The trailer can also be watched on Niconico here.

About the Crowdfunding Effort

The Qrates crowdfunding page for “Monogokoro” can be found here. When you visit it, you will be able to listen to the full version of airbabe’s song よあけまで (Yoake Made). The album will feature 8 songs sung by the UTAUs Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi, Number Bronze, and ORIGAMI-I.

A total of 100 copies of the vinyl version of the album are available, and the crowdfunding project will conclude once all 100 copies are reserved and shipped out to their buyers. You can click here to see how much it will cost to ship to your country. Those who reserve a copy will even be able to download HQ digital versions of each of the 8 songs contained in the album.

At the time of this article’s writing, there are 90 remaining vinyl copies.

Why Vinyl?

airbabe explains, “I wanted to create something that would reach a broader customer base, one that doesn’t usually listen to VOCALOID music. Even if this crowdfunding doesn’t end in success, I would still like for more people to know that it happened at all, so I hope everyone reading this can help spread the word on this project.”

Tracklist

Note: All translated song titles are unofficial.

Side-A

  1. ≪はなひらく≫ (Hana Hiraku, “Flower Bloom”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  2. ≪まちわびる≫ (Machiwabiru, “Sick of Waiting”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  3. ≪ものごころ≫ (Monogokoro, “Awareness”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko
  4. ≪よあけまで≫ (Yoake Made, “Until Daybreak”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi

Side-B

  1. ≪さがす≫ (Sagasu, “Search”) feat. Number Bronze, ORIGAMI-I
  2. ≪しとね≫ (Shitone, “Cushion”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko, Nizimine Kakoi
  3. ≪ゆるす≫ (Yurusu, “Forgive”) feat. Namae no Nai Ko
  4. ≪やすむ≫ (Yasumu, “Rest”) feat. Namae no Nai ko, Nizimine Kakoi

Official Links

For more information on airbabe and their works, check out the sites below, and stay tuned to VNN’s YouTube channel for official uploads of the album songs!

airbabe’s Official Site

airbabe’s YouTube Channel

airbabe’s Niconico Account

airbabe’s Facebook Page

Qrates Crowdfunding Site for “Monogokoro“

The post Reserve Your Copy of airbabe’s First Album on Vinyl Record! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kasane Teto x KOUSA Collaboration Announced!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
The excitement from Hatsune Miku‘s 10th anniversary may still be lingering in many fans’ minds, but let’s not forget that the 10th anniversary for another popular voice synth, Kasane Teto, is now less than half a year away! KOUSA – the semi-annual exhibition of technological works created by university students – will be holding their …

The post Kasane Teto x KOUSA Collaboration Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The excitement from Hatsune Miku‘s 10th anniversary may still be lingering in many fans’ minds, but let’s not forget that the 10th anniversary for another popular voice synth, Kasane Teto, is now less than half a year away!

KOUSA – the semi-annual exhibition of technological works created by university students – will be holding their winter 2018 exhibit on February 3rd and 4th next year at the Miraikan National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation, and it has been announced that Teto will serve as the star attraction! An illustration of Teto wearing a KOUSA parka has even been provided by 由杞 (Yoshiki) to serve as the main visual piece!

テトさんイラスト描かせていただきました！　重音テト×KOUSA 開催します！ 2018/02/03（土）, 02/04（日）日本科学未来館 https://t.co/lHeaJb4fGh @kousa2018さんから

— 由杞 (@yosiki59) October 8, 2017

“I drew the illustration of Teto-san for the Kasane Teto x KOUSA collab! It’ll be held at the Miraikan on February 3rd (Sat) and 4th (Sun), 2018 http://www.ne.senshu-u.ac.jp/~kousa2018/tetokousa/ Courtesy of @kousa2018“

TETO×KOUSAコラボ よろしくお願いしますね！@kousa2018 https://t.co/kKnsIGLG9O

— 重音テトおふぃしゃる「ツインドリル」 (@twindrill_teto) October 8, 2017

“Looking forward to working with @kousa2018 on the TETO x KOUSA collab!”

Confirmed displays so far include a special timeline of Teto’s history, a talking (and possibly touchable) life-size model of Teto, and a diorama of Teto’s most popular songs.

As more information on this collaboration is revealed, VNN will report on it!

Information Source

Kasane Teto x KOUSA Official Collaboration Site
TWINDRILL’s Official Twitter

The post Kasane Teto x KOUSA Collaboration Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Last week, the first batch of UTAU voice banks used for the characters in the anime Zunda Horizon were made available for public download and use. This week, two more voice banks have been released, getting fans ever closer to having access to the voices of the entire cast! Hokkaido Meron Voice Provider: Ayaka Shimizu …

The post Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Last week, the first batch of UTAU voice banks used for the characters in the anime Zunda Horizon were made available for public download and use. This week, two more voice banks have been released, getting fans ever closer to having access to the voices of the entire cast!

Hokkaido Meron

Voice Provider: Ayaka Shimizu

The school doctor at Furusato Girls Academy. She also makes Hokkaido-style snacks and confectioneries.

Hobbies: She has an insatiable foot fetish. She also enjoys tooling and tinkering, but has the faults of a speed maniac who focuses too much on velocity.

Abilities: Her helmet, which she calls the “Masked Mask,” has the ability to heighten the senses of its wearer. She can also infatuate and spellbind other people with the pheromones that she emits from her hair. However, when she’s wearing her Masked Mask, those pheromones end up spellbinding her, releasing her from the restraints of sense and reason instead.

Aspirations: Growing the snack industry in Hokkaido. That, and indulging herself in Zunko’s feet.

Download Hokkaido Meron’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Okinawa Awamo

Voice Provider: Aoi Koga

A first-year middle school student at Furusato Girls Academy. An untamed and free-wheeling lone-wolf type, though out of all the characters in Zunda Horizon, she is actually the most intelligent. Also possesses a rather foul mouth.

Hobbies: Always eagerly awaiting the next big event. When she gets tired of waiting, she’ll make the next big event herself. She also loves fishing.

Abilities: Her harpoon, which she calls the “Awa-mori” (mori or 銛 meaning “harpoon,” in this case), has the power to enhance the instinctive abilities of its bearer. She can also get drunk on sugar water and enter a drunken fighter state.

Aspirations: To live freely, as if carried off by the will of the wind.

Download Okinawa Awamo’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex

Demo Song #1: “From the Darkness”

Music, Lyrics, & Arrangement: higeoex

Demo Song #2: “Tenkiame”

Music: のーねーむ (No Name)
Photo: 黒井心 (Shin Kuroi)

There are still more Zunda Horizon characters whose voices banks haven’t been released yet, so stay tuned to VNN for updates on them!

Official Links

Tohoku Zunko Character Voice Page

Zunda Horizon Crowdfunding Page

The post Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Fanzine “UTAU is FOREVER” Celebrating UTAU Now Available for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
37 artists have come together to celebrate UTAU with 42 pages featuring more than 150 beloved UTAUs, from ones we all know to ones they personally love. This magazine is for charity and all profits go towards the ACLU. Pre-orders close on June 3rd and this will be the only print of the fanzine. Featured …

The post Fanzine “UTAU is FOREVER” Celebrating UTAU Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
37 artists have come together to celebrate UTAU with 42 pages featuring more than 150 beloved UTAUs, from ones we all know to ones they personally love. This magazine is for charity and all profits go towards the ACLU. Pre-orders close on June 3rd and this will be the only print of the fanzine.

Featured Artists

As mentioned, there are 37 artists involved in the project, many of whom have uploaded previews of their art! Artists in the zine include:

  • seica
  • Ekkoberry
  • Misha
  • kangda
  • Crusher-P
  • revolocities
  • rob/mugi
  • Jadii
  • AYA

  • TFOTR
  • Na-Nami
  • jellophish

  • YOOKI
  • 34CYGNI
  • niekaori
  • kuma★
  • Lurs
  • MiyuSama639
  • Adriann V
  • Mooms
  • KuroKitsuSan
  • ochkiart
  • Cine
  • Cillia
  • Tetsu Ebero

Art Previews

#utauisforever pic.twitter.com/alouRyCg8v

— Steel (@EmissarySteel) May 13, 2017

Featuring Denki Sai

Forgot to put it on twitter… It's a preview of my pic for @utauzine !
Draw about 10 chibi characters with Ayaka? #utauisforever pic.twitter.com/Vcff81BeV8

— Haru.jpg (@Haru_jpg) May 18, 2017

Featuring (from top left to bottom right) Iro Nanine, Aiko Kikyuune, Midori Injune, and Fushigi Maka

#utauisforever pic.twitter.com/WY04x4uEfH

— CINE @ exhaustion (@rozaeo) May 14, 2017

Featuring E-子 and Crecia Selestawa

asdfjghjk preview for my piece in #UtauIsForever zine hhh ?
pre-orders open now til June 3rd at @utauzine!!! ?‍?‍? pic.twitter.com/x62BhiF1jr

— ू(ʚ̴̶̷́ .̠ ʚ̴̶̷̥̀ ू) (@34CYGNI) May 20, 2017

Featuring Baak Yatchou

Also hq utauzine preview pic.twitter.com/fHxP0xzsKq

— シリア☆ (@cillia) May 19, 2017

Featuring Tomi Samura

Where to Buy

You can purchase the fanzine here until June 3rd. It costs $10 USD.

item.title: UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Zunda Horizon is the first-ever anime musical to use voice synths for all of its musical numbers. For instance, the main character, Tohoku Zunko, uses her actual VOCALOID voice bank to sing throughout the whole film! And she’s not the only one; every character who appears in Zunda Horizon has an UTAU voice bank, seven …

The post UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Zunda Horizon is the first-ever anime musical to use voice synths for all of its musical numbers. For instance, the main character, Tohoku Zunko, uses her actual VOCALOID voice bank to sing throughout the whole film! And she’s not the only one; every character who appears in Zunda Horizon has an UTAU voice bank, seven of which are now available for the general public to download and use!

Zundamon

Voice Provider: Yuina Ito

A zunda mochi sprite, capable of transforming into Zunko’s “Zunda Arrow.” Also carries a somewhat unlucky attribute, and often goes under everyone’s radar.

Hobbies: Just about anything involving zunda mochi.
Abilities: Transforming into the “Zunda Arrow.”
Aspirations: Popularizing zunda mochi, and also becoming a little more articulate at speaking.

Download Zundamon’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex
Demo Song: “スイートグリーン (Sweet Green)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: higeoex

Shikoku Metan

Voice Provider: Koyuki Tanaka

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate, constantly low on money and having to sleep outdoors.

Hobbies: Sulking in her teenage moodiness, though strangely skilled at writing furigana.
Abilities: Able to transfer methane hydrate warmth into any living organism (including humans) by kissing them. She’s also skilled at controlling her own body temperature, and won’t sweat on even the hottest of days. Her cherished white Lolita outfit never gets dirty.
Aspirations: Reviving the Shikoku clan, who can harness the power of methane hydrate.

Download Shikoku Metan’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Kyushu Sora mk=II

Voice Provider: Nozomi Nishida

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate and an android who was developed for space exploration.

Hobbies: Observing humans, for she was only recently created and finds anything and everything fascinating.
Abilities: Able to function on solar power alone. She comes equipped with standard audio and video recording capabilities, and can make herself float as if in zero gravity. About 700 of her units have been mass-produced, whom she is constantly syncing up with. However, she hates getting water or sand stuck in her joints.
Aspirations: Collecting data on all the mysteries of space.

Download Kyushu Sora mk=II’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)

Chugoku Usagi

Voice Provider: Rika Momokawa

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate and a shrine maiden from Izumo. She once skipped a grade, and is actually 14-years-old.

Hobbies: None. She was raised under the strict upbringing for a shrine maiden.
Abilities: Just by looking at someone, she can reduce the clothes on their backs to nothing but a pile of sand. It’s a very potent power, but she’s able to keep herself in check by playing with her stuffed rabbit named Inaba.
Aspirations: Being able to control and live peacefully with other people who possess special powers like Zunko.

Download Chugoku Usagi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)
Demo Song: “ドキドキ☆フレンズ(Doki Doki☆Friends)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: マサキりたんP (MasakiritanP) of sweet little devil
Movie: wolf
Vocals: タイラ (Taira)
Guitar: マサキ (Masaki)
Bass: YU-TA

Oedo Chanko

Voice Provider: Maria Sashide

A second-year primary school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Head of the rival organization “Daitokai.” She looks childish, but is also very selfish.

Hobbies: Ordering other people around. Because of that, she was never able to attend school while growing up, and thus enjoys going to school now.
Abilities: Controlling and riding in her sumo robot, Genjimaru. She possesses the strongest ability out of all the characters who have made their debut in Zunda Horizon. Using the fan that she wears on her head, she’s also able to manipulate the actions of anyone whom she douses with her special salt.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “having fun in school.”

Download Oedo Chanko’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex

Chubu Tsurugi

Voice Provider: Ayano Miura

A third-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s upperclassman, and General of the rival organization “Daitokai.”

Hobbies: Has a bit of a Lolita complex, and is strangely overprotective of her leader, Oedo Chanko. She’s also an impulsive collector of demonic swords, not to mention an idol otaku.
Abilities: The plate that she wears atop her head changes depending on her mood. She is very skilled with swords, being able to wield up to nine of them at once. She can also wield just one blade in hand and have the other eight float around her as she descends on her opponents.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “making sure that Oedo Chanko grows up healthy.”

Download Chubu Tsurugi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Kansai Shinobi

Voice Provider: Ayaka Imamura

A first-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s underclassman and co-worker at her part-time job, and also a scout for the rival organization “Daitokai.”

Hobbies: Restaurant-hopping. Her obsession with food is strong, and is firmly in the Kansai camp when it comes to udon. She’s also a fan of manzai.
Abilities: Able to draw from a number of various ninja arts, especially Kansai-style Ninjutsu. Quick battles are a common feat for her.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “having fun playing with Oedo Chanko and the gang.”

Download Kansai Shinobi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)
Demo Song #1: “トリトメ (Toritome)”
Music: 爆破みかん (Bakuha Mikan)
Movie: *yuuka

Demo Song #2: “テトテンシャン (Tetotension)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: タイラ (Taira) of sweet little devil
Movie: wolf
Vocals: タイラ (Taira)
Guitar: マサキ (Masaki)
Bass: YU-TA

And for those who still have yet to watch the first-ever anime voice synth musical, check it out now!

Official Links

Character Voice Download Page
Zunda Horizon Crowdfunding Page

The post UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: 2016 VOCALOID News Recap!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Quite a few fans noted that there was so much VOCALOID and vocal synth news this year that it was hard to keep up. Somewhere along the line, almost everyone has managed to miss something here or there. Thankfully, VNN is a giant archive of pretty much all of the news! So here’s a review …

The post 2016 VOCALOID News Recap! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Quite a few fans noted that there was so much VOCALOID and vocal synth news this year that it was hard to keep up. Somewhere along the line, almost everyone has managed to miss something here or there. Thankfully, VNN is a giant archive of pretty much all of the news! So here’s a review of all the BIG things that happened this year. We won’t be covering the smaller things like merchandise because that would be way too much.

New VOCALOIDs & Upgrades

2016 marked a huge year for the VOCALOID fandom. There were many releases as well as announcements of new VOCALOIDs set to come next year.

VOCALOID Releases

Unity-chan! Japanese (January 14)
Fukase Japanese & English (January 28)
Stardust Chinese (April 13)
Otomachi Una Japanese (July 30)
CYBER SONGMAN English (October 31)

VOCALOID Upgrades

Hatsune Miku V4X Japanese (August 31)
Hatsune Miku V4 English (August 31)
Tohoku Zunko V4 Japanese (October 27)
Macne Nana V4 Japanese (December 15)
Macne Nana V4 English (December 15)

Announced VOCALOIDs

Hatsune Miku V4 Chinese
Luo Tianyi V4 (Chinese)
Yuezheng Longya (Chinese)
Mo Qingxian (Chinese)
Zhiyu Moke (Chinese)
UNI (Korean)
UNI Append (Korean)
UNI English
COCOROBO (Japanese)
Tone Rion V4 (Japanese)
Yumemi Nemu (Japanese)

Other Notable Voice Banks

Releases

Daisy Hapyon (UTAU)
JOAN and OSCAR (UTAU)
Tohoku Kiritan (Originally an UTAU but became a VOICEROID+ as well)
Huan Xiaoyi (Sharpkey)

Announced

LEORA (Alter/Ego)

Concerts

Miku Expo North America
Miku Expo Taiwan
Miku Expo China
Magical Mirai 2016 (Exhibition Area Report) (MikuFan’s Report)
ALYS’ “Rêve de Machine”
IA Live Concert in Shanghai with Lia
IA “PARTY A GO-GO” Live in Costa Rica
IA “PARTY A GO-GO” Concert Screening World Tour
AHS “Songs Love”
Luo Tianyi at China’s 11th Golden Eagle Art Festival
Luo Tianyi at Bilibili Macro Link
VOCAMERICA

Announced

Vsinger Concert Featuring All 6 Characters

Games

Releases

Zyon on Android (iOS was released in 2015)
Hatsune Miku: VR Future Live (2nd Stage) (3rd Stage)
Project Diva X
Project Diva Future Tone (Japanese Release)
Hatsune Miku Dreamy Vocal iOS Version (Note: Available in China only)

Announced

Project Diva Future Tone (Western Release)
Hatsune Miku Dreamy Vocal Android Version

The post 2016 VOCALOID News Recap! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Xia Yu Yao’s 2nd Anniversary Special Flash Drive revealed!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Voicemith decided to impress us again by unveiling a special USB flash drive for Xia Yu Yao’s 2nd anniversary! It will include both the full and instrumental versions of the song “The Dark Angel”, along with eight wallpapers, a video featuring blessing messages from クエン酸P, 迷樣, and 喵四郎, and a lyric card. Bonus goods include …

The post Xia Yu Yao’s 2nd Anniversary Special Flash Drive revealed! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Voicemith decided to impress us again by unveiling a special USB flash drive for Xia Yu Yao’s 2nd anniversary! It will include both the full and instrumental versions of the song “The Dark Angel”, along with eight wallpapers, a video featuring blessing messages from クエン酸P, 迷樣, and 喵四郎, and a lyric card. Bonus goods include a cardholder, bookmark, and a 2nd anniversary themed Xia Yu Yao character card.

Only 200 units are available and they hinted that this will be the first prize of the blessing messages contest we talked about in our previous article.

They started selling the flash drive on November 15th at 6:30 PM CST via PChome, which you can find here.

Voicemith hasn’t stated yet whether the flash drive will be available internationally or not but we’ll be sure to update fans as soon as details about it are available.

Special thanks to VNN Chinese for translating information and making this article possible!

The post Xia Yu Yao’s 2nd Anniversary Special Flash Drive revealed! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Xia Yu Yao 2nd Anniversary Celebrations!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It seems like it was just yesterday that Xia Yu Yao was being released by Voicemith for the singing synthesizer UTAU and, now that two years have passed since her release, they’re celebrating this event with their fans once again by organizing a little contest! They announced the surprise on November 1st, showing us a stunning teaser of …

The post Xia Yu Yao 2nd Anniversary Celebrations! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It seems like it was just yesterday that Xia Yu Yao was being released by Voicemith for the singing synthesizer UTAU and, now that two years have passed since her release, they’re celebrating this event with their fans once again by organizing a little contest!

They announced the surprise on November 1st, showing us a stunning teaser of what seemed to be a PV made for a song featuring her, but without really telling us what it was going to be and giving us just a date as a hint: 11/11. This date marks Xia Yu Yao’s release and, as everyone surely could’ve guessed, they published a short version of a new original song composed by クエン酸, the well known producer of the popular Xia Yu Yao song “Tipsy Dessert,” titled “The Dark Angel.”

You can check out the video below:

This video, published on Voicemith’s official YouTube channel, features a PV illustrated by nyaroro and highlights how amazing Xia Yu Yao can sound, as well as some amazing vocal manipulation! Xia Yu Yao’s voicebank has definitely improved over these past two years, and we all wish for her to keep singing for us!

Contest

Speaking of “wishing together for her to sing for us,” Voicemith also announced a contest on their Facebook page to celebrate her birthday with the community!

【夏語遙二週年創意祝福留言票選活動】開跑囉!!!用你最具創意的祝福留言，一起慶祝語遙的兩週年生日吧!!!只要入圍第二階段票選就有精美小禮品喲^^<活動辦法>即日起至11月15日，在本貼文留言中，留下您最具創意的祝福(20字內，不…

Posted by Voicemith on Thursday, November 10, 2016

Fans must write a blessing message as a comment on the published contest post before November 15th. The message must not be longer than 20 words and you can only enter a message once. Voicemith will select ten entries for the next phase of the competition. These ten selected people will receive a prize and then be put against each other for fans to vote for their favorite one. The voting begins November 5th and the top three will be revealed later on.

Creativity will be the key for this challenge, so be sure to show your creative side and love for Xia Yu Yao!

Other Information

Be sure to check Voicemith’s official accounts, and keep an eye on VNN for updates and further information!

Special thanks to VNN Chinese for translating information and making this article possible!

The post Xia Yu Yao 2nd Anniversary Celebrations! appeared first on VNN.

The post Voicemith’s UTAU JOAN & OSCAR appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For those of you who are not familiar with Voicemith, they are the people behind the well-known Chinese UTAU Xia Yu Yao (夏語遙). She has a CV-VC Japanese voice bank and a CVVC simplified Chinese voice bank.


They now have two new UTAUs, JOAN and OSCAR, currently only with Chinese voice banks.

 

JOAN/蕎安 

Vocal Range: D3 ~ G4

BPM: 80 ~ 135 BPM

Height: 144.4 cm (while she insists it should be 145)

Weight: 40 kg

Voice Provider: 秋小酌

Illustrator: 瑞讀

Age: 17

Ability: She has the magic of ice. When her magic blends with her voice, she can calm people from rage and improve concentration.

 

 

 
OSCAR/ 奧斯卡
Vocal Range: D3 ~ G4

BPM: 80 ~ 135 BPM

Height: 182 cm

Weight: 75 kg

Voice Provider: 邁爾斯

Illustrator: 瑞讀

Age: 16

Ability: He has the magic of fire. When his magic blends with his voice, he can bring courage and make people feel warm.
They have also released a song featuring both of them singing together. Check it out!

Official Website
Official Voicemith Facebook Page
Official YouTube Channel
For all other Voicemith accounts, click here.

The post Voicemith’s UTAU JOAN & OSCAR appeared first on VNN.
